column1: Little Goat Diner////Like Girl & The Goat
column2: you could confidently pick just about anything off the menu.  We immediately bonded with our waiter
column3: who came quickly with offerings of double shot caffeination to suit just about any coffee lover's taste.  I don't usually handle dairy very well and was pleasantly surprised at the proactive suggestion of soy
column5: or almond milk to go with my just brewed super strong coffee.  Now how often do you get three other choices let alone one?
